page.text: Dear Jr. Traveler,We hope you’re excited about a great vacation! Your memory book is lled with many challenges, including pictures, trivia, scavenger hunts, and collections. It can be fun to work with your family or friends to complete the books together. Do your best, but always remember that the most important thing is to collect the sights, smells, and sounds of your vacation, and to ll the pages of this book with memories.Sometimes you will want to collect things that won’t t on the pages of your memory book. When that happens, put those items in the Souvenir Saver envelope. Other times, you will visit places that are not in the book. When that happens, collect mementos (like pictures, tickets, or receipts) and attach them to the blank pages in the back of this memory book.Be sure to visit us online at TravelersSeries.com before you leave on your trip to learn about other Jr. Travelers Series products and destinations. Wherever your vacation takes you, we’re glad you’re taking us along for the ride. Happy traveling!Sincerely,The Bowers and Medley familiesCo-Founders, Travelers Series Publishingjr. travelers series

估價及製作流程 目前仍無法準確估價，因為需等工程師去評估兩種方向(用或不用免費部落格)的合適程度，至於在虛擬主機方面 基本沿用原已租用的部份，若因製作需求而要加大規格，則實報實銷，架設本網站的報價將謹針對服務費。 (即設計及管理費用) mola corp 曼波魚創意
